item.title: NASA moon probe plays laser tag with Japanese lunar lander - Space.com
item.description:
1. NASA moon probe plays laser tag with Japanese lunar lander  Space.com
  2. NASA, JAXA Bounce Laser Beam Between Moon’s Surface and Lunar Orbit  Science@NASA
  3. Nasa beams laser pulse via Japan's Slim probe just as it did with Chandrayaan-3  India Today
  4. NASA's Moon-orbiting spacecraft has beamed a laser to Japan's SLIM lander on the Moon, and received a return signal  Sky at Night Magazine
  5. NASA Shot Laser At Japanese Lunar Lander From Orbit In Major Test  IFLScience
